titleStmt.title: The practice of thankefulnesse; or Davids choyse directions how to prayse God In an exposition and application vpon the whole sixtie sixe Psalme. With a short treatise vpon the thirtie one, and thirtie two verses of the one hundred and seuenth psalme.
titleStmt.author: [Larke, Nicholas]

titleStmt.title: The practice of thankefulnesse; or Davids choyse directions how to prayse God In an exposition and application vpon the whole sixtie sixe Psalme. With a short treatise vpon the thirtie one, and thirtie two verses of the one hundred and seuenth psalme.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by G. P[urslowe]. for Roger Iackson, and are to be sold at his shop, neere to the Conduit in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 1: An exposition of the sixtie sixe Psalme, by doctrine and examination.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
